    • Constructor Detail

      • InvToXMLOrg

        public InvToXMLOrg(java.lang.String h,
                   java.lang.String loc,
                   java.lang.String cutoff,
                   boolean lOnly,
                   boolean save)
        Creates a new instance of InvToXML for a single location, filenmae will match station, thread will start automatically, and output will be in current directory
        Parameters:
        h - The host for the MySQL server
        loc - The string of the location to generate
        cutoff - The cutoff date for epochs
        lOnly - Last epoch only flag
        save - If true, run the saveseed process

      • InvToXMLOrg

        public InvToXMLOrg(java.lang.String h,
                   java.lang.String file,
                   java.lang.String loc,
                   java.lang.String cutoff,
                   boolean lOnly,
                   boolean save)
        Creates a new instance of InvToXML for a single location. Thread will start automatically output to current directory
        Parameters:
        h - The host for the MySQL server
        file - The filename to use for output
        loc - The string of the location to generate
        cutoff - The cutoff date for epochs
        lOnly - Last epoch only flag
        save - If true, run the saveseed process

      • InvToXMLOrg

        public InvToXMLOrg(java.lang.String h,
                   java.lang.String file,
                   java.lang.String loc,
                   java.lang.String cutoff,
                   boolean lOnly,
                   boolean save,
                   java.io.File output)
        Creates a new instance of InvToXML for a single location. Thread will be started automatically
        Parameters:
        h - The host for the MySQL server
        file - The filename to use for output
        loc - The string of the location to generate
        cutoff - The cutoff date for epochs
        lOnly - Last epoch only flag
        save - If true, run the saveseed process
        output - A file pointing to a directory where output is to be put

      • InvToXMLOrg

        public InvToXMLOrg(java.lang.String h,
                   java.lang.String file,
                   java.lang.String loc,
                   java.lang.String cutoff,
                   boolean lOnly,
                   boolean save,
                   java.io.File output,
                   boolean startThread)
        Creates a new instance of InvToXML for a single location
        Parameters:
        h - The host for the MySQL server
        file - The filename to use for output
        loc - The string of the location to generate
        cutoff - The cutoff date for epochs
        lOnly - Last epoch only flag
        save - If true, run the saveseed process
        startThread - if true, start the thread on creation, other wise user must start the thread
        output - A file pointing to a directory where output is to be put

      • getError

        public java.lang.String getError()

      • run

        public void run()
        create XML file - most of what is needed to create a XML file is here. We put it in a Thread in case we ever wanted to overlap creatoins.
        Specified by:
